articles.author: Ted Bosworth
articles.title: ESC Issues First Comprehensive Cardiomyopathy Guidelines - Medscape
articles.description: The European Society of Cardiology has released the first major set of international guidelines to address cardiomyopathies beyond hypertrophic forms.
articles.content: The European Society of Cardiology has released new guidelines for cardiomyopathies, their first major comprehensive international guidelines to address diagnosis and treatment of the broad causes of… [+5541 chars]

articles.author: Michael Roppolo
articles.title: Blink-182 announces Travis Barker's return home due to "urgent family matter," postpones European tour - CBS News
articles.description: Hours before the band's announcement, Barker posted a series of photos to his Instagram account, including a banner that said, "Together we pray."
articles.content:
Blink-182 announced that three stops on the band's European tour had been postponed due to an "urgent family matter" that required drummer Travis Barker to return home to the United States.
